data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, mʼakoma atɔ me yam;
Ao Awurade, mɛkamfo wo wɔ aman no mu;
Ao Onyankopɔn, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma wo so tra ɔsoro,
Fa wo nsa nifa gye yɛn na boa yɛn,
Onyankopɔn akasa afiri ne kronkronbea sɛ,
Gilead yɛ me dea; Manase nso saa ara;
Hwan na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu?
Ao Onyankopɔn, ɛnyɛ wo na woapo yɛn?
Onyankopɔn wɔ yɛn afa yi, yɛbɛdi nkonim,
